::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod continued to walk, and began talking to Savanna.
"Savanna, we are here to shoot any Alliance member you see. Sooner or
later, Prowl and Dinobot are going to come out of there with the
hostages. Are mission is to hold off the Alliance troops that are going
to be on there tail."
